statements: DELETE FROM model_predictions WHERE prediction_id = 1 AND model_name = 'model1';
DELETE FROM model_predictions WHERE evaluation_metric = 'accuracy' AND prediction_value > 0.8;
DELETE FROM evaluation_metrics WHERE metric_id > 100 AND model_name = 'Model A';
DELETE FROM evaluation_metrics WHERE model_name = 'model_A' AND accuracy > 0.8;
DELETE FROM evaluation_metrics WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression' AND accuracy < 0.8;
DELETE FROM evaluation_metrics WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression';
DELETE FROM comparison_results WHERE model1_id=1 AND model2_id=2;
DELETE FROM model_predictions WHERE id = '1' AND model_name = 'Linear Regression';
DELETE FROM evaluation_metrics WHERE model_id = '2' AND precision > 0.8;
